channel.title: Matrix Program Thing
channel.description:
Ok, this is totally random but I find it awesome. My teacher told us today, if anyone manages to make a program that I made, then that person gets extra points for programming. So I made the program for those extra points. It's this shitty program that uses nested "for loops" to create a sort of diamond shaped figure that exists out of x's based on the number you enter.
Now I took that program out of boredom and tuned it a little. I replaced the x's with the matching iterators and added a nice color to the application.
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?c25odpt5554p9h0]http://www.mediafire.com/?c25odpt5554p9h0[/url]
This is written in C#.
For the pussies out there, no this does NOT contain a virus.
After you open the program type in 3000 and hit enter. Then put your Command Prompt on full screen and enjoy.
EDIT: Important detail I forgot to mention, the result of this thing is some sort of matrix effect.
